body.name: M8 (Manual C-Measure: 43~45mm) Wall Mount Screw Kit Compatible with Curved & Flat LED/OLED/QLED Samsung TVs (NU/MU/KU/RU/KS/Q6/Q7/Q8 Series) Includes Screws, Adapters and Washers.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 24 mins
features: COMPLETE SET: One set of 4 metric M8 x 43mm screws (Behind bracket length, per specs. Actual length 50mm). Nylon spacers, flat and spring lock washers, are all included in purchase.
CORRECT SPACERS: Extra long spacers that substitutes for BN61-13518A / BN96-43169A. These spacers are of the exact same length, and full compatible with the Samsung OEM adapters.

SPECIFICATION: Exact C-Measure of 43 ~ 45 mm (Check your TV manual). These bolts are designed to give you the correct C-Measure once installed. The C-Measure is the insertion depth behind the TV mount bracket into the TV.
VERSATILE: Compatible with most RU / NU / MU / KS/ RU / Q6 / Q7 / Q8 series Samsung TVs and some KU series TVs. If you TV manual calls for 3 to 45mm bolts, then these are for you.
BLACK PLATED: Black oxide surface treatment for rust prevention. It matches the color of many TV and mount components, creating a professional appearance.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #71,911 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics) #1,030 in TV Wall & Ceiling Mounts

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This TV wall mount screw set has been designed specifically to be compatible with your Samsung TV, ensuring that you have the perfect fit for your mounting needs. With four M8-1.25 43~45mm (behind bracket length) VESA compatible screws and spacers included in the kit, you can easily mount your TV to the wall with confidence, knowing that your TV will be held securely and safely in place. Whether you're mounting your TV in the living room, bedroom, or any other room in your home, this screw set will provide the durability and reliability you need for a successful installation. You will receive One set of metric screws, four screws in total. Four black machine screws with washers and spacers.

Hassle-Free TV Mounting with This Complete Screw and Spacer Set Perfect fit Our premium wall-mounting screw and spacer kit is tailored to fit your specific TV model, guaranteeing a hassle-free and secure installation. Experience the perfect blend of functionality and aesthetics with the right screws and spacers that provide a sleek and secure wall mount for your TV. Peace of mind With the inclusion of correctly sized spacers and both flat and locking spring washers, the screws are held firmly in place, preventing them from loosening over time. This ensures that your TV remains securely mounted to the wall, even under the stress of daily use. You can have peace of mind knowing that your TV is mounted safely and securely with this screw set. VESA-Compliant By using screws that are VESA-compatible, you can ensure that your TV will be securely mounted to the wall with a stable and level mount. If the screws are not VESA-compatible, they may not fit properly into the mounting holes, which can lead to an unsafe or unstable mount, or even damage to your TV Durable and Stylish The black plated mount kit offers a modern, sleek appearance that will complement any TV setup. The screws are designed to be durable and long-lasting, providing a reliable solution for your wall mounting needs. The included nylon spacers ensure proper installation and can help prevent damage to cables or cords that are running behind or around the TV.

Building Trust, One Screw at a Time We are a US-based hardware company, providing a wide range of top-quality replacement screws for various applications. From DIY enthusiasts to professional contractors, trust us for reliable and durable hardware solutions.

reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I needed to hang my Samsung TV on a wall bracket. Correct size bolts and spacers.Very good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Replacement screws and spacers for Samsung TVs.
reviews.reviewText: Fit well in my 50" TV, secured to the wall mount as expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Loose fit, shorted one sleeve
reviews.reviewText: The biggest issue I have with this purchase is that my order only shipped with 3 sleeves. On my Samsung TV, the sleeves did fit within the recess, but very loosely. I was expecting a tighter fit so the weight of the TV wasn't resisted by the bolts bending and prying on the embeded nut so much. The length was just a touch too long so I had to grab an extra washer for each bolt. When I purchased the TV, it did come with the proper sleeves, but I have lost them. If you can find genuine replacement parts for your TV I would recommend you buy those instead.
